name: 8 Queens
description: 8 Queens is a simple puzzle game where you need to arrange the maximum number of queens on a chessboard so that they don't “beat” each other. Arrange the queens and pump your mind!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 128 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 128 MB available space
